definition[0]: shared or made by every member of a group or society
example[0]: a collective decision made by all board members
example[1]: our collective responsibility for the environment
definition[1]: a group of people who work together to run something such as a business or farm, and who share the profits equally
definition[2]: the business or farm that is run by this type of group
definition[3]: a farm or factory that is owned by a government and controlled by the people who work in it
example[2]: In the 1990s, the collective farm system collapsed in post-Soviet Russia.
example[3]: This has to be a collective decision.
example[4]: Management must take collective responsibility for the bankâ€™s collapse.
